kw.name: Open Browser To Home Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//a[contains(@class, 'dropdown-item') and contains(text(), 'ไทย')]' did not appear in 10 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
kw.status: Element 'xpath=//a[contains(@class, 'dropdown-item') and contains(text(), 'ไทย')]' did not appear in 10 seconds.
Element 'xpath=//a[contains(@class, 'dropdown-item') and contains(text(), 'ไทย')]' did not appear in 10 seconds.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Starting from default Thai, switch to English and verify texts and banner.
